title: ReadWest: Stories of the American West
description: Story by Elmer Kelton: "The Last Indian Fight in Kerr County." Matthew Wayland and his young wife Rachal have settled on a small farm in Kerr County, Texas. While breaking the ground for his new wheat field, Matthew senses a Comanche attack and makes a fast track for home to protect his wife and defend their land.Also includes stories by John D. Nesbitt, Don Bendell, Mike Kearby, Steven Law, D. B. Jackson, and L. D. Clark.All profits from the sale of this story will benefit the ReadWest Foundation, Inc.
author: Elmer Kelton
